segments.text: Hi , have you got the exact number of people who are going take part in this activity ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there are 62 in totals , and 2 of them still can't be sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They always push the time . How many of them are over fifty ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 6 . So we should give them special attention . Some of them don't have a good health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I see . As far as you think , how many buses should we get for them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 2 should be enough , for each one has at least 30 seats . There will be some seats to spare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll call the bus charter later . And have you announced the itinerary of this journey to all of them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , most of them think it's good . But , some people have different opinions . They consider we should arrange some challenging activities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's possible . At that time , they can choose any activity they like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good . I'll tell them later . And what kind of medicine we should be prepared ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me think ! Pills for carsick , traditional medicine for cold , some painkillers and something like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , we should get them ready this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One more thing , have you got all people's phone numbers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , God . I've almost forgotten . I'll get it done right away .
segments.speaker: S2
